entry.string: Images is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: Imeges is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for basic image manipulation, including the following:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur beseec imege-a muneepooleshun, incloodeeng zee fullooeeng:

entry.string: Add text to an image file (think buttons here...)
entry.translation: Edd text tu un imege-a feele-a (theenk boottuns here-a...)

entry.string: Currently, this is the only supported feature - more will come later.
entry.translation: Coorrently, thees is zee oonly sooppurted feetoore-a - mure-a veell cume-a leter. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: The IMAGE tag is useful for displaying (cached) images at different proportions. Images are resized according to the height/width values you specify with the resulting image cached for faster displaying later on. Note: Any other attribute not listed will be passed directly on to the resultant <img> tag.
entry.translation: Zee IMEGE teg is useffool fur deespleying (ceched) imeges et deefffferent prupurshuns. Imeges ere-a reseezed eccurdeeng tu zee heeeght/veedt felooes yuoo speceeffy veet zee resoolteeng imege-a ceched fur fester deespleying leter oon. Bork bork bork! Nute-a: Uny oozeer ettreeboote-a nut leested veell be-a pessed durectly oon tu zee resooltunt <img> teg.

entry.string:
Examples:

Resize an image's width while keeping the proportions:

<xar:image-resize src="23" width="92px" constrain="1" label="my logo" />
entry.translation:
Exemples:

Reseeze-a un imege's veedt vheele-a keepeeng zee prupurshuns:

<xar:image-resize src="23" width="92px" constrain="1" lebel="my lugu" />
Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
